name: Deeper Destiny
description:
You fell at the gates of Hell for a dangerous journey, there’s no escape but to go deeper facing monsters along the path. Fight ghouls, lost souls and demons as they try to kill you on your way to conquer the throne.

Deeper Destiny is a game made during Ludum Dare 48 in 72h.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deeper-destiny
